name: Infinite Darkness
description:
Use a+d to move left and right. Use space to jump. This game is still in beta. I am still working on the full game and hopefully it will be out before September 2022. Enjoy! In future I will make the game take up the whole screen. Sorry about the black bars, ): I know they might make the game a bit more difficult, but you can still play in the browser with the html.

Right now I am only updating the embed on itch, the zip files will get updated later (:
